channel.title: Comments for page "Three Out Of Four Bonus!"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Three Out Of Four Bonus!"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i know for a fact that The Twins lv.1 give: +2 levels, -1 strength, -8 difficulty to tracking during bingo attempt. after all i have them. the lv.2 version apparently gives (if you click the link on the team listing) +4 levels, -1 strength, -4 difficulty to tracking during bingo attempts.

item.title: Tracking Range?
item.content:encoded: I thought the twins lowered the difficulty of a tracking attempt, not increased your rangeâ€¦
